name: Virtual Boy - Family Fun Game
description:
Naughtiness with Family Boy quite fascinating.

Another master piece for Virtual Mom & Virtual DAD fanatics now in form of Virtual Boy - Family Fun Game. This is a adventurous game with a peculiar and fun mechanics. Play this game and find out how cool is to do joyful activities. Different real life engaging activities you have to perform. Cleaning the room, water balloon fight with friends, go to school by bicycle, planting the seeds, playing with pet, solving quiz & many more amazing activities.

Choose your character with your own choice. Unlock different levels with performing amuse activities. This game is extremely addictive and fascinating. Complete a succession of missions to complete a level. Your ultimate mission is to enjoy and make fun at hell. Be careful & perform your all activities.

Let the Fun begin with just one click!

Virtual Boy - Family Fun Game Features:
• High Quality 3D Graphics
• Awesome Sounds
• Addicting RPG family boy game
• Exciting and funfilled missions to complete
• Smooth and Easy Controls
• Super Cool house environment
• Realistic Life simulation
